casebody.data:
Billy SHAFFER, petitioner,
v.
CITY OF SOUTH CHARLESTON, WEST VIRGINIA, et al. No. 15-9017. Supreme Court of the United States June 13, 2016.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until July 5, 2016, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
